summary: This bill, the Continuing Appropriations and Extensions Act, 2026, provides continuing appropriations for federal departments and agencies for fiscal year 2026 while extending various programs and authorities. It includes extensions for public health, Medicare, human services, and Department of Veterans Affairs programs. It amends several existing laws related to healthcare, social security, and veterans' benefits. The bill also addresses topics like over-the-counter drug user fees, budget enforcement, and various miscellaneous extensions and adjustments to existing programs, covering a range of federal activities.
